website_summaries.verdict: The Nightingale does a great job masking unwanted ambient noise, but its high price could be a deal breaker for some.
pros: Cambridge Sound Management's $300 Nightingale offers customizable sleep sounds, its two-device design creates an immersive stereo effect and it's very easy to install
Bonus: it works with Amazon Alexa and IFTTT
cons: The iPhone app isn't the easiest to navigate

customer_reviews.title: Out of business
customer_reviews.text: Beware!! The company went out of business and you can no longer activate your account using the app, effectively making these WORTHLESS. It's unconscionable to sell these junk items.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to Operate
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this product to help cover noise between rooms. They were difficult to program and would never pair to the phone we were using. They also cut off randomly throughout the day. The noises were kind of annoying in an office setting but I can see how they would work well for nighttime use at home. Would not recommend for noise cancellation in an office but may be better for home use.
customer_reviews.author: RSIP

customer_reviews.title: Zzzzzzzzzz
customer_reviews.text: I am a finicky sleeper...I need a fan on at all times to fall asleep. Once asleep I can easily be awaken by noises. Such as, my husbands snoring! This product has helped solve two problems. 1. My husband hates my fan. With this product I was able to Eliminate the need for the fan ! 2. The soothing sounds of a thunderstorm rock me to sleep and mask my husbands “loud breathing” for a restful sleep. We are very pleased with the units. -The Gomez’s
customer_reviews.author: Marcos Gomez

customer_reviews.title: Sleep problems no more!
customer_reviews.text: Have been struggling with sleep for weeks. Partially due to my infant who sleeps in my room waking up. First night using this and everyone slept all night. First time in over a month. I haven’t felt refreshed like this in quite some time!
customer_reviews.author: Jenna

customer_reviews.title: Natural Sleep Aid
customer_reviews.text: The Nightingale has a lot of sound options and volumes. It operates with an app on the phone and has an LED light that can be used for a night light with different colors.
customer_reviews.author: Jerome

customer_reviews.title: Simulates the sounds of a submarine
customer_reviews.text: This product really helped with dealing with my tinnitus. Brought me back to my Navy days when there was a constant hum of the boat's machinery allowing me to sleep better. I have been experimenting with the device's other sounds but I still like the low hum. Also like the different color lights.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Shannon

customer_reviews.title: I love the automatic turn on/off from your phone
customer_reviews.text: I purchased to help assist with 5 year old twins bedtime routine. Since we purchased this sound system it has helped reduce our routine by more than half; the 2 night lights and the white noise has helped my boys settle down much quicker. I love the automatic turn on/off from your phone, ability to schedule when you want to the white noise to start/end and the fact I don’t lose outlet space. ”
customer_reviews.author: Laura H.

customer_reviews.title: waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Returned immediately, waste of money. These "sound blankets" are varying volumes of noise. They don't cover up road noise. Just create chaos. My whale, rain sounds didn't work either. The Alexa Echo was $30 (black friday deal) and does a way better job. I've been eyeballing this product for years. This was extremely disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: Random failures
customer_reviews.text: Good idea but buggy execution. One unit randomly turns off which defeats the whole purpose of having this system. I get woke up by the cessation of white noise, have to get up, unplug the unit, plug it in again and hopefully it starts up again.
customer_reviews.author: Seattle 123

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy.  Garbage.
customer_reviews.text: Total garbage. Purchased 6 units for an office and none of them connected or functioned properly. I returned all of them and had to dispute the charges on my credit card or file A to Z claims to get a refund.
customer_reviews.author: JTB

customer_reviews.title: A Product I've Come To Love
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical at first, and it took some getting use to (like a week or two) but I have come to really love this product. The sound helps both my wife and I sleep through the night more soundly. I would certainly recommend the Nightingale System, realizing it is important to run it for a couple of weeks before one can appreciate its true value.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Schwarz

customer_reviews.title: One unit didn't work after one night use. I ...
customer_reviews.text: One unit didn't work after one night use. I couldn't get used to the noise level even though I put it on the lowest​ setting. I returned it
customer_reviews.author: Gloria O'Brien

customer_reviews.title: Might work great for somebody else
customer_reviews.text: Had a difficult time managing its wi-fi connection. Finally gave up and returned it. Might work great for somebody else.
customer_reviews.author: Connecticut reader

customer_reviews.title: Does not work and have not been able to get replaced
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for sound devices but could never get them to work. There is no manufacturer information or help information. A friend has tried to help but so far no luck; I may still be able to return to Amazon, but would not repurchase
customer_reviews.author: Jimbo

customer_reviews.title: terrible app
customer_reviews.text: Garbage. The app is poorly designed, not optimized for the latest phones, and poorly connects with the outlet device via wifi. IFTTT support is also poor - I tried to connect this to a Wemo switch that controls another noise machine. The applet runtime was hours - so once the wemo switch was pressed, I wasn't to expect the Nightingale system to turn on for hours. It never did via IFTTT. Boxed it back up. I really wanted this to be a solution to our small room which doesn't have a table or anywhere for a typical white noise machine to sit. Will have to look for another solution.
customer_reviews.author: B Coyle

customer_reviews.title: Great concept & product
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this through kickstarter and love them. I work all hours and long hours so coming home to this makes my transition to home relaxing. The Hospital white noise and whales are my favorite. Comparing this to Alexa is not real, as I have both . They are two different concepts . I have 3 German shepherds and they calm down and fall asleep better.
customer_reviews.author: J. Dillenbeck

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: When I first started with my devices it seemed as they would not work, however I came to find out that I was working them wrong. Once I figured out what I was doing wrong they connected and worked as I was hoping. The devices look like regular wall outlets so they blend into the walls and don't look out of place. I did not lose any outlets as the plugs are still on the devices. I like the nightlight as I can choose the color and the intensity. Found the room balancing worked well and made it so the room not as spotty.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: DON'T DO IT
customer_reviews.text: Bought this system and could never get past registration; kept getting a 401 error code. You can't contact customer service with registration...catch 22 and vicious loop. I have a not so inexpensive piece of what amounts to be NOTHING!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Zzzzzzzz.
customer_reviews.text: We have enjoyed improved sleep after installing nightingale in our master bedroom. The sound blanket it produces is relaxing and comforting, and has helped us get to sleep faster and stay asleep longer than we ever could before.
customer_reviews.author: Cara

customer_reviews.title: Sleeping better
customer_reviews.text: We are glad for the Nightingale Sound system. My wife and I are sleeping better and feel comforted by the sounds it makes...very soothing.
customer_reviews.author: Alan Ray

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: Pleased overall. I was using my phone with a noise app but the sound was limited. Nightingale produces a stereo effect that is very effective which is why I bought it. Limited with quantity of sound options. Buggy sometimes with app. Could be louder.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.text: From day one this sleep system has been amazing! I have three systems (one in each bedroom of my home) and all of my family members love it. We initially bought them to block out noise from nearby traffic, but now we bring them everywhere, even on vacation, because the sounds are so soothing. No more sleepless nights, no more tossing and turning! Just pure bliss. I am a VERY SATISFIED customer
customer_reviews.author: Michael Gray

customer_reviews.title: Download a FREE app instead.
customer_reviews.text: I should have downloaded a FREE app on my phone instead that integrates with my existing Bluetooth speakers. The app is GLITCH city. I've had a horrible time waking up in the middle of the night to shut this thing off. I would recommend downloading a free app on a mobile device or simply going to youtube and listening to white noise or a waterfall effect. $300 is flat out, outrageous a lot of the options for noise tracks are really BAD, the whale one is literal torture. This is hilariously overpriced.
customer_reviews.author: Daviche

customer_reviews.title: Two thumbs up for customer service
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing. I wake less due to the amazing sound blanket this product produces. I had some technical issues that caused me to give a lower rating at first, but I spoke with two people who helped me figure the whole thing out. It did take a day or two, and multiple phone calls, but guys, they were on it. They called me and emailed me within hours and minutes after my responding to them. Great great customer service on top of a great product. Not five stars because I'd like a few more sounds.
customer_reviews.author: Tlh

customer_reviews.title: Disaster
customer_reviews.text: IF you can actually get the units to produce any sound (a big if, given that the app crashes every day, and there are no manual controls), you'll find it's just another white noise hissing sound, except in stereo. The tiny speakers are so cheap that you cannot even make the the tone deeper. These would be a rip off for $50; I have no idea how they are trying to charge $300 for them.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonUser

customer_reviews.title: I live really close to a freeway.. it ...
customer_reviews.text: I live really close to a freeway.. it is literally on the other side of a "sound wall" in my backyard. I use to sleep with earplugs in until I bought this. It helps tremendously! The white noise drowns out the sound of passing by cars. There are a few things that need to be fixed.. it occasionally doesn't turn on at the scheduled time or just one will turn on in place of both. I usually fix this by going to the app and turning them off and then back on. Overall, I would reccomend this product.
customer_reviews.author: TLee

customer_reviews.title: Useful product with a few bugs--still recommended
customer_reviews.text: I purchased through kickstarter and use this system every night. Once I was able to figure out programming, which was a bit more complicated than it needs to be, it's worked on schedule ever since. I really like the stereo effect, and it has worked well for me overall. I would like to have more of a choice of sounds in the future, but it's nice to have it run regularly at night in the background as is.
customer_reviews.author: Gingerbread Cat

customer_reviews.title: Great Night Sleep!
customer_reviews.text: It actually might work too well! We have to keep the volume a little lower than what you should to experience the surround sound, but when we have it louder, we seriously don't hear anything! Neighbors dogs, police sirens, our smoke alarm, kids crying in next room, etc! I mean, it's great- but we realized we actually do need to hear a little real-life noise :) Love the phone app and being able to set a start/stop time. If we aren't in bed by the time it starts to rain, we hassle to and get there!
customer_reviews.author: $hoppy

customer_reviews.title: awful
customer_reviews.text: horrible product. the app is absolute trash. doesn't stay on schedule. avoid at all costs
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Hagel

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Give these a try. The iOS ap works fine. Could use a USB charging port and more options for sounds... the sound blanket choices are limited, would be 5 stars if more choices... are you listening Cambridge?
customer_reviews.author: Lupo

product_meta.title: Nightingale Smart Solutions 2 Piece, 1.0 Pound
feature_bullets: sleep better by masking common indoor and outdoor noises
Adjusts to a variety of room sizes, room types, and sleep conditions
control from a smartphone or PC and over Wi-Fi or Bluetooth

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
